required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Sequential Single and Multiple Ascending Doses of YG1699
clinical_study.official_title: A Randomized, Double-blind, Placebo-controlled, Sequential Single and Multiple Ascending Doses (SAD/MAD) Study Following Oral Administration in Healthy Subjects to Evaluate the Safety, Tolerability, and Pharmacokinetics of YG1699

brief_summary.textblock: This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, dose-escalation study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics (PK) of YG1699 following single and multiple ascending oral dose administration.

detailed_description.textblock:
This is a randomized, double-blind, placebo-controlled, dose-escalation study to evaluate the safety, tolerability, and pharmacokinetics (PK) of YG1699 following single and multiple ascending oral dose administration.
The study consists of 2 parts: Part 1, SAD dose-escalation; Part 2, MAD dose-escalation.

study_design_info.intervention_model_description: Single Ascending Dose and Multiple Ascending Dose

secondary_outcome.description: area under the plasma drug concentration time curve from time 0 to T (AUC)
